nodes.text: Meren Siefel was a female assassin, who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Siefel carried out a number of killings for Zerex, the governor of the planet Ord Adinorr. When Zerex was promoted to become the moff of the Meridian sector, he held a celebratory party in his mansion on Ord Adinorr and appointed Siefel to serve as his head of security during the event.
